about_the_game:
Play normal game with some nice perks!
2000G from the start plus the following items:
  • Medal of Expertise OR Crown of War
  • Demented Skull OR Immortal Circlet
  • 3x Dragon Shoes OR Gotha Card


To make sure you've installed our DLC properly, go to your Steam client and click on:
Sexy Heroine! Part 3 > Properties > DLC

To use the DLC click on the following link and check the folder Sexy MoneyDLC:
Sexy Heroine! Part 3 > Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files

Download and copy our special savefile directly from the Sexy Money DLC folder and paste it to:
C:\Users[Name]\AppData\Roaming\SEXY HEROINE! PART 3\Saves

name: Sexy Money!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
